name: yurunsoft/imi
description: 基于 Swoole 开发的协程 PHP 开发框架，常驻内存、协程异步，致力于丰富框架文档，上手容易，让开发者跟使用传统 MVC 框架一样顺手

scripts.install-test: php --ri swoole && composer install && cd ./tests && composer install && cd ../ && composer test
scripts.install-test-no-dev: php ./.travis/composer-no-phpunit.php && php --ri swoole && composer install && cd ./tests && composer install && cd ../ && composer test-no-dev
